short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace occurrences of 'Account Engagement' with Custom Text, improving the UX within Salesforce

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhances the User Experience when it comes to working with Salesforce Marketing Cloud Account Engagement.

Replaces "Account Engagement" with user text in a few areas:
- Lightning Tabs (Green Arrow in Screenshots)
- Lightning Page Field Names (Yellow Arrow in Screenshots)
- Object Manager's Page Layout Drag & Drop Fields (Red Arrow in Screenshots)
- Object Manager's Page Layout Placed Fields (Blue Arrow in Screenshots)

For consistency, this extension also ensures that ALL Account Engagement Lightning tabs have the same prefix (Purple Arrow in Screenshots)

This extension DOES NOT:
- Affect the Account Engagement Experience for any other user
- Rename the Lightning App Name
- Rename any App Launcher search results
- Rename fields when working with Reports
